  • java.lang.Object
    • minesweeper.main.Game

            int height,

        Abstract representation of a minesweeper game.
        Parameters:
        widht - the width of the game grid
        height - the height of the game grid
        mines - the number of mines desired for the game grid

        public Game()
        Abstract representation of a minesweeper game. Creates a new hard game.

        gameType - the type of game to create
